source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_00<tab>Gerolt has the air of a man defeated.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_00<tab>ハーストミルのゲロルトは、冒険者に要望があるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_01<tab>Gerolt has reluctantly agreed to lend his expertise to the restoration of a legendary arm of yore. For the first step, the weaponsmith bids you venture within Natalan in the Coerthas central highlands to retrieve the lost Gae Bolg. Search for a vessel in which the valuable relic might be kept.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_01<tab>ゲロルトからの依頼を受けた。クルザス中央高地のナタラン入植地にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E3E01 /var>」を調べて「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E885F01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the timeworn Gae Bolg. Make your way back to Hyrstmill and present the relic to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E885F01 /var>を入手した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E885F01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_03<tab>According to Gerolt, the restoration process involves merging the old with the new─that is, embedding the original relic in a new host weapon. To this end, you must bring him a champion's lance melded with two grade three savage aim materia.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_03<tab>ゲロルトに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E885F01 /var>を渡した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」に「<var 28 ((Item)) F2162701 /var>」を2個装着した「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075701 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_04<tab>You have delivered the materia-enhanced champion's lance to Gerolt. The weaponsmith next directs you to go to the Weeping Saint in the Coerthas central highlands, and obtain alumina salts from the dhorme chimera.

※The dhorme chimera can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination.
※This objective must be completed as a dragoon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_04<tab>ゲロルトに<var 28 ((Item)) F2075701 /var>を渡した。クルザス中央高地の聖ダナフェンの落涙で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E941901 /var>」を調べ、コンテンツ「ドルムキマイラ討伐戦」を開放しよう。開放された「ドルムキマイラ討伐戦」を攻略し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。
※このコンテンツは、竜騎士になった状態でクリアする必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_05<tab>You have painstakingly obtained the pinch of alumina salts. Make your way back to Hyrstmill and deliver it to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>を入手した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_06<tab>Using the alumina salts you brought him, Gerolt adds the finishing touches to your relic weapon. Even as he declares his work over, however, the man believes that there is still something incomplete about it. In order to shed light upon the mystery, Gerolt suggests that you seek out literature surrounding the hero associated with the relic. Perhaps the trader Rowena back at Revenant's Toll will be able to assist you in this endeavor.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_06<tab>ゲロルトに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>を渡した。モードゥナのレヴナンツトールにいる「ロウェナ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_07<tab>You have consulted Rowena, who agrees to procure the literature you seek...for a price. For your part of the deal, you must obtain for her an Amdapor glyph. Make your way through Amdapor Keep in the South Shroud, and procure this artifact.

※Amdapor Keep can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a dragoon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_07<tab>ロウェナと話した。南部森林の「邪教排撃 古城アムダプール」を踏破し「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E887101 /var>」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。
※このコンテンツは、竜騎士になった状態でクリアする必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_08<tab>You have successfully obtained an Amdapor glyph. Make your way back to Revenant's Toll and deliver it to Rowena.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_08<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E887101 /var>を入手した。モードゥナのレヴナンツトールにいる「ロウェナ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E887101 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_09<tab>You give the Amdapor glyph to Rowena, who upholds her promise and furnishes you a copy of <var 1A 02 /var>The Book of Reinette<var 1A 01 /var>. You now possess literature on the hero who once wielded the relic weapon. Gerolt the weaponsmith will be keen to peruse it.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_09<tab>ロウェナに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E887101 /var>を渡した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E887A01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_10<tab>After a cursory examination of the text, Gerolt declares that he will require some time to make sense of its contents. In the meantime, you are to familiarize yourself with the restored weapon in its current state. Arm yourself with the unfinished Gae Bolg, make your way to Natalan in the Coerthas central highlands, and there slay eight Natalan boldwings, eight Natalan fogcallers, and eight Natalan swiftbeaks.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_10<tab>ゲロルトに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E887A01 /var>を渡した。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を装備して、クルザス中央高地のナタラン入植地にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073301 /var>」を8体と「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073501 /var>」を8体、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073401 /var>」を8体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_11<tab>You have defeated the specified Ixal. Return to Hyrstmill and report your success to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_11<tab>魔物を討伐した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_12<tab>Upon your return, Gerolt deduces that you must face mightier adversaries if you are to experience a revelation pertaining to your relic. To this end, he bids you challenge the hydra within Halatali, the abandoned training grounds situated in eastern Thanalan. Armed with the unfinished Gae Bolg, enter Halatali and defeat the hydra.

※The hydra can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_12<tab>ゲロルトと話した。東ザナラーンのハラタリ修練所で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E941A01 /var>」を調べ、コンテンツ「ハイドラ討伐戦」を開放しよう。開放された「ハイドラ討伐戦」を、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を装備して攻略しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_13<tab>You have overcome the hydra. Take word of your accomplishment back to Gerolt at Hyrstmill.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_13<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087101 /var>を討伐した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_14<tab>Combining information gleaned from the text with your firsthand experience, Gerolt has ascertained what must be done next. Hand over the unfinished Gae Bolg to the weaponsmith.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_14<tab>ゲロルトと話した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」に「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_15<tab>Gerolt declares that but one step remains in the restoration. In order to create the raging fire that he needs, the weaponsmith bids you fetch him a white-hot ember, a howling gale, and a chunk of hyperfused ore. The first of these can be obtained by defeating Ifrit within the Bowl of Embers (Hard).

※The Bowl of Embers (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a dragoon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_15<tab>ゲロルトに<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>を渡した。「真イフリート討滅戦」に参加して蛮神「イフリート」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。
※このコンテンツは、竜騎士になった状態でクリアする必要があります。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_16<tab>You have extinguished the Lord of the Inferno and obtained a white-hot ember. Next, take on Garuda in the Howling Eye (Hard) and defeat her to obtain a howling gale.

※The Howling Eye (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a dragoon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_16<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>を入手した。「真ガルーダ討滅戦」に参加して蛮神「ガルーダ」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。
※このコンテンツは、竜騎士になった状態でクリアする必要があります。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_17<tab>You have silenced the Lady of the Vortex and obtained a howling gale. Next, take on Titan in the Navel (Hard) and defeat him to obtain a chunk of hyperfused ore.

※The Navel (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
※This objective must be completed as a dragoon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_17<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>を入手した。「真タイタン討滅戦」に参加して蛮神「タイタン」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。
※このコンテンツは、竜騎士になった状態でクリアする必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_18<tab>You have buried the Lord of Crags and obtained a chunk of hyperfused ore. Deliver it along with the white-hot ember and the howling gale to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_18<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>を入手した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_19<tab>You have delivered the three items Gerolt requires to create a raging fire. Now he only wants for a bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil to complete the restoration of your relic. Obtain this item and deliver it to the weaponsmith.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_19<tab>ゲロルトに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」を渡した。北部森林のハーストミルにいる「ゲロルト」に「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_20<tab>You have delivered the bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil to Gerolt, who promptly sees to the final stage of the restoration process. After no small amount of effort and perseverance, you are now the proud owner of the Gae Bolg. May it serve you well in your adventures to come!
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SEQ_20<tab>ゲロルトに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」を渡した。冒険者の神狩りの成功に感じ入ったゲロルトは、武具職人として神業を見せ、ついに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075D01 /var>」が完成した！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_000<tab>Jus' let me make one thing clear: it might be as I'm repairin' kettles to pay for yesterday's mead, but I still got me pride as a master weaponsmith. Ye'll get no less than the finest out of me forge.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_000<tab>チッ、いいか？
今じゃ、酒場のヤカンを作っちゃいるが……
腐ってもオレは一流の武具職人だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_001<tab>An' it might be as ye've got that godsdamned slip of paper, but it'll only get ye so much. Restorin' relics like these calls for some rare ol' materials, an' I ain't got none. So if you want the job done, ye'll have to run along an' fetch 'em for me.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_001<tab>ハンパな仕事をするつもりはねぇ。
それも「古の武器」を復元するとなりゃ、おおごとだ。
テメェにも、材料集めだなンだで、働いてもらうからな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_002<tab>So, what is it ye want restored?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_002<tab>テメェは、どんな武器を求めてるンだ？
オレに話してみろ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_003<tab>Fancy yerself a dragonslayer, eh? Well, I happen to know jus' the weapon for ye...but wouldn't it be quicker if ye had one of the Holy See's blacksmiths pound one out?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_003<tab>竜騎士向きの長槍だと？
……しかし、イシュガルド教皇庁の専属鍛冶師に
製作を頼まねぇところを見ると、わけありの様子だな？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_004<tab>Hm, yer expression tells me there's a reason why ye came to me instead. Well, I ain't one to pry into the affairs of Ishgard. Don't fancy being branded a heretic, see. Also, I don't reckon I'd enjoy the view from the Gates of Judgement half so much if me head was on a pike.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_004<tab>おっと、詳しく話すンじゃねぇ。
妙なことに首をつっこンで、おっかねぇ神殿騎士の連中に
「異端者」扱いされるのはゴメンだからな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_005<tab>Anyroad, it's a spear named Gae Bolg that ye'll be wantin'.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_005<tab>ともかく、竜騎士用の長槍がお望みなら、
竜槍「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075D01 /var>」を復元するのがいいだろうよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_006<tab>I've heard tell it's made of dragon bone, but how it's forged is a jealously guarded secret. Bein' the genius that I am, though, I reckon I can unravel the mystery if I could jus' get me hands on a sample.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_006<tab>ドラゴン族の骨を使うらしいンだが、製法は明らかにされてねぇ。
ま、現物さえ手に入れりゃ、オレがなンとかしてやらぁな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_007<tab>Now then, did ye ever hear of Saint Reinette, the legendary dragoon? I only ask 'cause she's s'posed to have wielded the very same weapon, see.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_007<tab>問題は、その入手方法だが……
高名な女竜騎士「聖女レネット」の槍を探すってのはどうだ？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_008<tab>Story goes that a dragon slew her sweetheart, promptin' the ol' girl to seek out the beast what did it an' put it down. Havin' exacted her revenge, they say she thrust her spear into the ground where the battle was waged, givin' up the life of a dragoon to become a woman of the cloth.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_008<tab>レネットは、恋人を殺したドラゴン族への復讐を遂げた後、
戦場となった谷に自らの槍を突き刺し、戦いの道を離れ……
修道士として貧しき者に尽くして暮らした「聖女」様だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_009<tab>Unlucky for ye, the valley where the spear sleeps is Ixali territory─a stronghold called Natalan, to be precise. But if yer desire's strong, I trust ye already know what must be done.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_009<tab>だが、その谷も、今やイクサル族の支配下にある。
「ナタラン入植地」と呼ばれている場所なンだが……
探してみる価値はあるンじゃねぇか？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_010<tab>It's a spear named Gae Bolg that ye'll be wantin'.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_010<tab>竜槍「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075D01 /var>」を復元するのがいいだろうよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_011<tab>I've heard tell it's made of dragon bone, but how it's forged is a jealously guarded secret. Bein' the genius that I am, though, I reckon I can unravel the mystery if I could jus' get me hands on a sample.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_011<tab>ドラゴン族の骨を使うらしいンだが、製法は明らかにされてねぇ。
ま、現物さえ手に入れりゃ、オレがなンとかしてやらぁな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_012<tab>Now then, did ye ever hear of Saint Reinette, the legendary dragoon? I only ask 'cause she's s'posed to have wielded the very same weapon, see.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_012<tab>問題は、その入手方法だが……
高名な女竜騎士「聖女レネット」の槍を探すってのはどうだ？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_013<tab>Story goes that a dragon slew her sweetheart, promptin' the ol' girl to seek out the beast what did it an' put it down. Havin' exacted her revenge, they say she thrust her spear into the ground where the battle was waged, givin' up the life of a dragoon to become a woman of the cloth.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_013<tab>レネットは、恋人を殺したドラゴン族への復讐を遂げた後、
戦場となった谷に自らの槍を突き刺し、戦いの道を離れ……
修道士として貧しき者に尽くして暮らした「聖女」様だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_014<tab>Unlucky for ye, the valley where the spear sleeps is Ixali territory─a stronghold called Natalan, to be precise. But if yer desire's strong, I trust ye already know what must be done.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_014<tab>だが、その谷も、今やイクサル族の支配下にある。
「ナタラン入植地」と呼ばれている場所なンだが……
探してみる価値はあるンじゃねぇか？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_020<tab>Well, bugger me... Never in me wildest, drunkest dreams did I imagine ye'd actually find the bloody thing... Bah, so I'll have to fire up the forge, after all.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_020<tab>……ま、まさか……本当に
「古の武器」を手に入れてくるとは……
チッ、本当に働くことになるなンてツイてねぇな……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_021<tab>Havin' said that, the relic's in far worse shape than I thought. It ain't like to survive much poundin' in this state. Truth be told, I'd be worried about sneezin' near it.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_021<tab>仕方ねぇ、手伝ってやるとすっか。
だが、いかんせんテメェが持ってきた
「古の武器」は状態が悪すぎる。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_022<tab><sigh> We're gonna need a new host what'll give itself for the restoration.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_022<tab>少しでも手を加えればブッ壊しかねねぇ。
「原型」となる別の武器を叩き台に、
「古の武器」を組み込んで復元するしかねぇな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_023<tab>Bring me a champion's lance, one with two grade three savage aim materia melded to it. This'll serve as the vessel for the restored relic.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_023<tab>原型は……「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075701 /var>」がいいだろう。
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2162701 /var>」を、ふたつ装着したもンを用意するンだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_024<tab>Remember, that's <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> grade three savage aim materia. Aught less, an' ye'll get naught from me, no matter how many slips of paper ye wave in me face.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_024<tab>「古の武器」の原型にするにゃ、それくらいの業物じゃないとな。
それらを全部持ってきたら、
オレが竜槍「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075D01 /var>」を復元してやらぁな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_030<tab>Ye need to bring me a champion's lance, one with two grade three savage aim materia melded to it. This'll serve as the vessel for the restored relic.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_030<tab>原型は……「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075701 /var>」がいいだろう。
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2162701 /var>」を、ふたつ装着したもンを用意するンだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_031<tab>Hm? Aye, I could hammer one out in me sleep, but then I could wipe yer arse without much trouble, an' I ain't plannin' on doin' that neither! Seems ye'll jus' have to do both yerself, eh?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_031<tab>原型用の武器となりゃ、わざわざオレが作るまでもねぇ。
テメェで用意するンだな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_040<tab>Ah, 'tis a fine base ye've brought me. Aye, jus' the thing to host yer relic.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_040<tab>原型用の武器に問題はねぇようだな。
よし、「古の武器」を組み込むために、
ちょいといじってやるか……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_041<tab>I've merged what was left of the relic with the host weapon, so the groundwork's done. But don't go jumpin' for joy jus' yet─there's still more to do.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_041<tab>チッ、こいつは思ったよりやっかいだぞ。
テメェが手に入れてきた「古の武器」は、
オレの想像以上に状態が悪かったンだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_042<tab>I need to work on the finishin' touches, but due to the reinforcement work I've had to do, the weapon's provin' rather stubborn to shape.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_042<tab>だからよ、ガッチガチに補強したンだが……
おかげで普通の砥石じゃ調整できなくなっちまった。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_043<tab>To get 'round this, we'll be needin' some alumina salts, a substance made by grindin' a rock called alumina into fine grains. Unlucky for ye, though, it ain't easy to get hold of.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_043<tab>そこで役に立つのが、
鋼玉を溶かして粉砕した粒「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>」だ。
問題は、入手するのが難しいってことなンだが……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_044<tab>Mayhap ye already know this, but there's beasties out there what devour their prey whole. An' some of 'em swallow rocks so as to aid with digestion.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_044<tab>ところで知ってるか？
一部の魔物は、丸呑みした獲物を胃ですりつぶすため、
鉱石をいっしょに飲み込むンだそうだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_045<tab>The dhorme chimera what terrorizes the central highlands o' Coerthas happens to swallow alumina salts for this purpose.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_045<tab>それが高温のブレスを吐く魔物……
例えばクルザス中央高地を騒がせる魔物、
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087201 /var>なら……あとはわかるな？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_046<tab>Slay the bugger an' bring me the alumina salts, an' I'll see to the finishin' touches on yer weapon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_046<tab>ヤツを始末して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>」を持ってこい。
そうすりゃ、細部の仕上げに入ることができるからよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_047<tab>The dhorme chimera can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination situated at the Weeping Saint in the Coerthas central highlands.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_047<tab>クルザス中央高地「聖ダナフェンの落涙」の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E941901 /var>で、
コンテンツ「ドルムキマイラ討伐戦」を
開放できるようになりました。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>Please note that the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Chimera” must be completed as a dragoon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>「竜騎士」になった状態で
「ドルムキマイラ討伐戦」に挑み、
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087201 /var>を倒しましょう！

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_050<tab>Jus' a dozen more kettles, then it's off to the tav─
<var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> again!? What in the seven hells do ye want this time!?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_050<tab>はやいとこ、ヤカンを完成させて、
しこたまエールを飲……な、なンだ、テメェは！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_051<tab>Forgotten what to bring, eh? Gods' sake, <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, ye've got the memory of a bleedin' whatsit!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_051<tab>もう、何をすべきか忘れちまったンか？
いいか、もう一度だけ説明してやる。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_052<tab>Slay the dhorme chimera an' bring me alumina salts, an' I'll see to the finishin' touches on yer weapon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_052<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087201 /var>を始末して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>」を持ってこい。
そうすりゃ、細部の仕上げに入ることができるからよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>The dhorme chimera can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination situated at the Weeping Saint in the Coerthas central highlands.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>クルザス中央高地「聖ダナフェンの落涙」の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E941901 /var>で、
コンテンツ「ドルムキマイラ討伐戦」を
開放できるようになりました。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>Please note that the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Chimera” must be completed as a dragoon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>「竜騎士」になった状態で
「ドルムキマイラ討伐戦」に挑み、
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087201 /var>を倒しましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_060<tab>...An' o' course, the adventurer comes back triumphant. <sigh> Should've bloody known not even the chimera would be able to put ye out o' me misery.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_060<tab>……チッ、まぁ～だ生きていやがったンか……。
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087201 /var>も案外ふがいねぇ……いや、なンでもねぇよ。
こっちの話だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_061<tab>Hand over those alumina salts, an' I'll get right to work.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_061<tab>ともかく「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E886801 /var>」、確かに受け取ったぞ。
ちょいと待ってろ、復元作業を進めるからよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_062<tab>There, the deed's done. I've squeezed out every onze of me skill to restore yer weapon, an' I think ye'll agree it looks the part.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_062<tab>ふぅ……。
細部に手を入れたから
それなりの見た目には、なってきたぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_063<tab>Yet there's summat...missin' somehow, though I'm buggered if I know what. The piece jus' lacks a certain <var 1A 02 /var>glow<var 1A 01 /var>, as it were.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_063<tab>だが、何かが足りねぇ……。
今度ばかりは、さすがのオレにも何が足りねぇのかがわからン。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_064<tab>We need to learn more about the relic. Literature surroundin' the hero associated with it would be a fine place to begin...but I ain't exactly a scholarly an' haven't the slightest inklin' where to get me hands on such stuff.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_064<tab>もっと、この「古の武器」に関する情報があれば……
そう、情報が足りねぇンだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_065<tab>As much as I hate to say this, Rowena's probably the one to talk to. Thing is, I'd sooner shove hot kettles up me arse sideways than owe that thrice-damned harridan another debt.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_065<tab>過去に「古の武器」を使っていた英雄たちについて、
ヤツらの活躍を描いた逸話や伝承、詩歌を集めてこい。
その中に、何かヒントになることが書かれているかもしれン！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_066<tab>Yer gonna have to make yerself useful once again. Take yerself to Rowena an' ask for her help, an' return here once ye've learned summat what might be of use.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_066<tab>誰に聞けばいいのか、だと？
古い写本でも持ってねぇか、ロウェナにでも聞いてみるンだな。
あのアバズレは、古い品物にめっぽう詳しいからよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_070<tab>You're lookin' a bit more run-down than before. Your dealin's with Gerolt takin' their toll? Actually, forget I even asked. My mouth tastes o' bile if I so much as <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> o' that sorry specimen. So, is there somethin' you need?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_070<tab>ん、調子はどう？
ゲロルトには、ウンザリさせられているって表情ね。
ところで、あたしに御用？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_071<tab>...Literature on the hero of old who once wielded your weapon?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_071<tab>……「古の武器」の復元のために、
英雄たちについての逸話を記した写本を……ね。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_072<tab>Hm, I reckon I can find what you need. Might take a bit o' time, is all.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_072<tab>確かに、あたしのツテを使えば、
そうした古い写本や書物を手に入れることは、
さほど難しくはないはず。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_073<tab>'Course, this ain't a charity I'm runnin' here. I can get you what you want, but you'll have to do likewise for me.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_073<tab>でも、あたしは商人なの。タダで取り寄せるなんて願い下げ。
ここは冒険者と商人らしく、取引といきましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_074<tab>I'll track down literature on Saint Reinette.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_074<tab>あたしは「聖女レネット」を題材にした写本を探す。
あんたは、あたしが欲しいものを手に入れる。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_075<tab>For your part, you're to bring me an Amdapor glyph. You'll find this inside Amdapor Keep, a ruined castle situated in the South Shroud.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_075<tab>つまり「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E887101 /var>」よ。
黒衣森南部森林の「古城アムダプール」っていう
第五星暦時代の遺跡を踏破すれば見つかるはずよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_076<tab>Clear on the deal? Then run along and fulfill your part of it.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_076<tab>さぁ、公正な取引を成立させるためにも、
お互い必要なものを手に入れてこようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_080<tab>Ah, good <var 08 E905 ((on you)) ((lad)) /var>! This is exactly what I was after. You've honored your part o' the bargain, and so I'll do the same.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_ROWENA_000_080<tab>確かに、集めてくれたようだね。
こっちも約束を守るとしよう。さぁ、交換だよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_090<tab>Back to pester me so soon? Judgin' from that smirk on yer face, I take it ye've found what ye need?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_090<tab>チッ、もう戻ったのか……
おぅおぅ、ごくろうさンでしたっと。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_091<tab>Aye, this text is about Saint Reinette, all right. But gods, would it have killed the bugger that wrote it to use normal bloody words!?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_091<tab>確かに「聖女レネット」について記された写本みてぇだな。
しっかし、読みにくい代物だなぁ、オイ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_092<tab>It'll take me bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>moons<var 1A 01 /var> to get through this lot─time I could be spendin' on kettles! Gah...while I try to make head or tail of it all, why don't ye take this here unfinished Gae Bolg an' try it out?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_092<tab>そうだ。
オレが休ン……じゃねぇ、写本を読み込ンでる間に、
テメェは、この「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を試してこい！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_093<tab>As I mentioned before, it's still missin' summat, but it's all there shape-wise, meanin' it should serve ye jus' fine as an ordinary weapon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_093<tab>カタチだけは、それなりに仕上がってるから、
そこそこ使える武器にはなってるハズだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_094<tab>Seein' as yer a ripe ol' dragoon, mayhap ye'll be able to feel out exactly what it wants for.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_094<tab>竜騎士ならではの視点ってやつで、
この武器に何が足りてねぇのかを調べてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_095<tab>That's to say, get out there an' fight some nasty foes, as Saint Reinette herself must've done back in the day.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_095<tab>写本から得られる知識と、テメェが体感して得た感覚。
これを合わせることで、答えを探すンだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_096<tab>Natalan, the Ixali stronghold over in Coerthas, oughta serve yer needs─aye, the same place ye found the lance. Pit yerself against some Natalan boldwings, fogcallers, an' swiftbeaks─eight of each, say─then come back an' tell me what ye've gleaned.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_096<tab>よし、かつての「聖女レネット」の様に、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を装備して、強敵と戦ってこい。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_097<tab>With the information in the text an' yer firsthand experience, I reckon we'll solve this puzzle yet.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_097<tab>……そうだな、クルザス中央高地の「ナタラン入植地」にいる
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073301 /var>、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073501 /var>、
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073401 /var>を各8体なで斬りにして来るンだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_100<tab>I want ye to get out there an' fight some nasty foes, as Saint Reinette herself must've done back in the day.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_100<tab>よし、かつての「聖女レネット」の様に、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を装備して、強敵と戦ってこい。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_101<tab>Natalan, the Ixali stronghold over in Coerthas, oughta serve yer needs. Pit yerself against some Natalan boldwings, fogcallers, an' swiftbeaks─eight of each, say─then come back an' tell me what ye've gleaned.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_101<tab>……そうだな、クルザス中央高地の「ナタラン入植地」にいる
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073301 /var>、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073501 /var>、
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2073401 /var>を各8体なで斬りにして来るンだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_EPICMOOGLE_000_105<tab>You mustn't lose your relic, kupo! I went to great pains to retrieve it, so promise me you'll take better care of it!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_EPICMOOGLE_000_105<tab>大切な武器を捨てちゃうなんて、とんでもないクポ！
モグがちゃんと拾っておいたクポ！
絶対なくしちゃダメクポよ？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_110<tab>Back already? By the frown yer wearin', I take it ye've got nothin' to show for yer time with the birdmen.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_110<tab>おう、帰ってきたか。
……だが、そのツラからすっと、
まだ古の武器に足りねぇモンを掴みきれてねぇようだな？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_111<tab>Hmmm, might be as ye want for better sport. An' I know jus' the creature what'll give it to ye─the hydra what reigns over the fiends within Halatali. A nasty piece of work, that. Try not to piss yer britches when ye see it.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_111<tab>こうなったら、伝説に残るような戦いをするっきゃねぇ。
……そうだな「ハラタリ修練所」のヌシ、
多頭龍「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087101 /var>」を倒してこい。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>The hydra can be confronted via the Duty Finder upon examining the quest destination situated by the entrance to Halatali in eastern Thanalan.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>東ザナラーン「ハラタリ修練所」前の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E941A01 /var>で、
コンテンツ「ハイドラ討伐戦」を
開放できるようになりました。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>Please note that the trial “A Relic Reborn: The Hydra” must be completed while equipped with the unfinished Gae Bolg.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を装備して
「ハイドラ討伐戦」に挑み、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087101 /var>を倒しましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_FAFAJONI_000_120<tab>We Immortal Flames have managed to cull most of the feral denizens of Halatali, but the hydra still remains. Frankly, we're out of our─
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_FAFAJONI_000_120<tab>棲み着いていた魔獣も、あらかた掃討できたんですが、
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087101 /var>」という大物だけが残っていて……。
ええ！？　奴に挑むつもりですか？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_FAFAJONI_000_121<tab>What!? You mean to face the fell creature!? To be sure, we would be grateful if you could rid us of it, but I must warn you of the dangers. Survival is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> guaranteed.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_FAFAJONI_000_121<tab>修練所のヌシ「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087101 /var>」は、
恐怖をまき散らす、恐るべき存在。
命の保証はできませんよ、それでも行くのです！？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_125<tab>In order to challenge the hydra, you must be equipped with the unfinished Gae Bolg.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_125<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087101 /var>との戦いは、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を装備している状態でのみ
挑むことができます。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_130<tab>Bloody hells, not ye again! Can't a man have a moment's bleedin' rest!? I've barely had time to <var 1A 02 /var>piss<var 1A 01 /var> since you gave me that damnable text.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_130<tab>あぁン？　写本はどうしたのか、だと？
細けぇ文字を見てると、頭痛くなるンでな！
……ヤカン作って、気分転換してるンだよ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_131<tab>Readin' the thing's given me a fierce bloody headache...which yer makin' worse by houndin' me!
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_131<tab>ガミガミガミガミ、テメェはオレの母ちゃんか？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_132<tab>Do me a favor an' make yerself scarce, will ye? Go an' play with yer bloody Gae Bolg or summat.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_132<tab>テメェも、こんなところでグダグダしてねぇで
さっさと「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075201 /var>」を試して、
意見を聞かせろってンだ！　チクショウめぇ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_EPICMOOGLE_000_135<tab>You mustn't lose your relic, kupo! I went to great pains to retrieve it, so promise me you'll take better care of it!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_EPICMOOGLE_000_135<tab>大切な武器を捨てちゃうなんて、とんでもないクポ！
モグがちゃんと拾っておいたクポ！
絶対なくしちゃダメクポよ？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_140<tab>Yer... Yer still alive! Why the hells do you adventurers have to be so godsdamned sturdy!? I was bloody <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> ye'd be hydra dung by now... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_140<tab>チッ、まだ生きてやがったンか……。
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2087101 /var>に喰われれば、良かったのにな？
……まぁ、それはともかく、写本の話でもすっか。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_141<tab>But what's done is done...or in this case, <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> done. Anyroad, let's talk about that text ye brought. It contains an account of Saint Reinette's painfully pious life. Seems to be a part of Ishgard's holy scriptures.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_141<tab>写本は、聖女レネットの生涯をつづった
イシュガルド正教の教典のひとつだった。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_142<tab>Be true to the Fury, live in virtuous penury, dedicate yer life to the blah-bloody-blah...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_142<tab>神の教えに従い、清貧を貫き、愛と奉仕の生活を……
ってな具合で、眠くなることこのうえねぇ代物でよォ。
目を覚ますために、何杯、エールが必要だったと思う？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_143<tab>The book fair put me to sleep, an' not even eleventeen flagons of mead can do <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_143<tab>……な、なんだよ、その目は。
冗談だよ。飲ンでねぇし、飲むゼニもねぇよ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_144<tab>Anyroad, one bit touched on ol' Saint Reinette's time as a dragoon. That's where I found a passage describin' the relic spear Gae Bolg.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_144<tab>まぁ、とにかく
聖女レネットの竜騎士時代に関する記述も、少しはあってな。
竜槍「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075D01 /var>」についても、しっかり書かれていたぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_145<tab>Turns out the base of the spearhead─that's the bit what looks like wings─ain't jus' for show. Apparently, it helps dragoons get their arc jus' right when they're leapin' on their prey.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_145<tab>穂先の根元にある翼状の突起は飾りじゃなく、
飛び上がって敵にブッ込むときに、槍の軌道を操る……
そういった役目があるってことがわかったンだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_146<tab>As ye can see, I've done me research. I trust ye've also been pullin' yer weight, puttin' the relic to use like I said. Well, go on, then─tell me what ye've learned.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_146<tab>そんなわけで、オレの方は収穫があった。
テメェの方は、どうなんだ？　しっかり使い込ンだンだろうな？
「体感して得た感覚」ってもンを、説明してもらおうか！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_147<tab>Is that so? Aye...I'd wondered about that.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_147<tab>なるほど……言いてぇことはわかった。
確かに、テメェが指摘することにも一理はある。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_148<tab>Based on what we've gleaned from the text an' yer firsthand experience, I'll rework the relic so as to improve yer affinity with it. Hand it over for a second, will ye?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_148<tab>よし。
写本の記述を再現しつつ、テメェの手に馴染むように
調整を加えてやンぞ。貸してみろや。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_EPICMOOGLE_000_149<tab>You mustn't lose your relic, kupo! I went to great pains to retrieve it, so promise me you'll take better care of it!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_EPICMOOGLE_000_149<tab>大切な武器を捨てちゃうなんて、とんでもないクポ！
モグがちゃんと拾っておいたクポ！
絶対なくしちゃダメクポよ？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_150<tab>Based on what we've gleaned from the text an' yer firsthand experience, I'll rework the relic so as to improve yer affinity with it. Hand it over for a second, will ye?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_150<tab>よし。
写本の記述を再現しつつ、テメェの手に馴染むように
調整を加えてやンぞ。貸してみろや。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_151<tab>There, the deed's done. That leaves us with one last step.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_151<tab>ふぅ……これで、ちったぁマシになったろう。
あとは、最後の焼き入れを残すのみだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_152<tab>That is, fully mergin' the old relic, the new host, an' the soul of the bearer─aye, that's <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. Only then can the weapon be restored to its former glory.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_152<tab>「古の武器」と原型の武器、ふたつの武器と使い手の魂を
最後の焼き入れによって、完全に融合させる！
往年の姿を復元するンだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_153<tab>But to do this, I need a fire what's hotter than the seventh hell. An' to keep such a fire alive an' ragin', I need a wind what's fiercer than the...than the...er, hangover I had last week. Gah, ye know what I mean!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_153<tab>そのためには、地獄の業火の如き炎と、
炎を維持するための烈風、炉を作るための黄土、
そして、冷却するための油が必要だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_154<tab>Jus' get me a white-hot ember, a howlin' gale, an' a chunk o' hyperfused ore, an' I'll finish yer bloody weapon! Ah, an' I need me a bottle o' Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenchin' oil as well to cool it off!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_154<tab>焔神「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」と
嵐神「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」、岩神「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」……
さらに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」を手に入れてくるンだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_155<tab>The white-hot ember, the howling gale, and the chunk of hyperfused ore can be obtained by defeating Ifrit in the Bowl of Embers (Hard), Garuda in the Howling Eye (Hard), and Titan in the Navel (Hard), respectively.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_155<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」は「真イフリート討滅戦」にて、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」は「真ガルーダ討滅戦」にて、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」は「真タイタン討滅戦」にて入手可能です。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_156<tab>The bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil can be obtained by exchanging 15 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 ((　28)) 0302 /var> with Auriana, one of Rowena's assistants at Revenant's Toll.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_156<tab>なお、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」は、レヴナンツトールにいるオーリアナに
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　28)) 01 /var>」を15個渡すことで、
入手することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_160<tab>In order to restore yer weapon to its former glory, we need to fully merge the relic with the new host. Oh, aye─an' yer soul. Don't worry, though─it might not hurt much.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_160<tab>そのためには、地獄の業火の如き炎と、
炎を維持するための烈風、炉を作るための黄土、
そして、冷却するための油が必要だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_161<tab>Get me a white-hot ember, a howlin' gale, an' a chunk of hyperfused ore, an' I'll finish yer bloody weapon.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_161<tab>焔神「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」と
嵐神「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」、岩神「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」……
さらに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」を手に入れてくるンだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_162<tab>The white-hot ember, the howling gale, and the chunk of hyperfused ore can be obtained by defeating Ifrit in the Bowl of Embers (Hard), Garuda in the Howling Eye (Hard), and Titan in the Navel (Hard), respectively.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_162<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」は「真イフリート討滅戦」にて、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」は「真ガルーダ討滅戦」にて、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」は「真タイタン討滅戦」にて入手可能です。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_163<tab>The bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil can be obtained by exchanging 15 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 ((　28)) 0302 /var> with Auriana, one of Rowena's assistants at Revenant's Toll.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_163<tab>なお、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」は、レヴナンツトールにいるオーリアナに
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　28)) 01 /var>」を15個渡すことで、
入手することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_170<tab>So yer back... Never doubted for a second ye'd trounce all three primals an' come back to pester me again.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_170<tab>ヘ、ヘヘヘッ……
本当に蛮神との戦いから、生きて戻ってくるとはよ……。
し、心配し……いや、なんだ。……テメェも、やるじゃねぇか。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_171<tab>All right, then, let's see the white-hot ember, the howling gale, an' the hyperfused ore.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_171<tab>よし、まずは「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888301 /var>」、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E888C01 /var>」、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E889501 /var>」を渡してくれ。
炉の準備をするからよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_172<tab>Aye, these oughta get me the levels o' heat I need. Which leaves just the Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenchin' oil for coolin' things off afterwards. Ye've got that, too, I assume?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_172<tab>へへ……こいつがあれば炉は問題ねぇ。
お次は、冷却用の「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」だ。
ちゃんと用意してきたンだろうな？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_100_172<tab>The bottle of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han quenching oil can be obtained by exchanging 15 <var 31 ((Item)) 04 ((　28)) 0302 /var> with Auriana, one of Rowena's assistants at Revenant's Toll.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_100_172<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187B01 /var>」は、レヴナンツトールにいるオーリアナに
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　28)) 01 /var>」を15個渡すことで、
入手することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_173<tab>Ye've done yer part, an' so I'll do mine.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_173<tab>ヘ、ヘヘヘッ……
これで全ての準備が整ったぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_174<tab>Watch now, an' try not to bat yer eyelids─ain't every day ye get to see a relic reborn!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_174<tab>テメェが神狩りを成したのなら、
オレも武具職人として、神業を見せねぇわけにはいかねぇな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_175<tab>Muahahaha... MUAHAHAHAHAHA! These gods-given hands've worked yet another miracle! Feast yer eyes on Gae Bolg, jus' as it was in days of yore! 'Tis a sight to move a man to tears...ye lucky bastard. Ye'd better bloody well take care of it!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_175<tab>はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……
つ、ついにできたぞ……それが「<var 28 ((Item)) F2075D01 /var>」だッ！！！
大切にしろよなッ！！！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of Amdapor Keep.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>この先、クエストを進行させるには、
「邪教排撃 古城アムダプール」の攻略が必要になります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>In order to gain access to Amdapor Keep, you must complete the quest “Ghosts of Amdapor.”
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>なお、「邪教排撃 古城アムダプール」を
コンテンツファインダーに登録するためには、
特定のクエストをコンプリートする必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of the Bowl of Embers (Hard).
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>この先、クエストを進行させるには、
「真イフリート討滅戦」の攻略が必要になります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Please note that gaining access to the Bowl of Embers (Hard) requires that you make sufficient progress in the main scenario.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>なお、「真イフリート討滅戦」を
コンテンツファインダーに登録するためには、
メインクエストを進めておく必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of the Howling Eye (Hard).
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>この先、クエストを進行させるには、
「真ガルーダ討滅戦」の攻略が必要になります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>Please note that gaining access to the Howling Eye (Hard) requires that you make sufficient progress in the main scenario.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>なお、「真ガルーダ討滅戦」を
コンテンツファインダーに登録するためには、
メインクエストを進めておく必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must complete the objectives of the Navel (Hard).
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>この先、クエストを進行させるには、
「真タイタン討滅戦」の攻略が必要になります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_207<tab>Please note that gaining access to the Navel (Hard) requires that you make sufficient progress in the main scenario.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_207<tab>なお、「真タイタン討滅戦」を
コンテンツファインダーに登録するためには、
メインクエストを進めておく必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_210<tab>Gods, I've been dry as a bone for the past six bells. M-Mead... Jus' give me enough mead to wet me lips...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_GEROLT_000_210<tab>貧乏臭ぇ冒険者が、なンの用だ？　あぁン？
こちとらテメェになんざ、用はねぇンだよ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Please note that you can only undertake one “A Relic Reborn” quest at any given time. If you wish to acquire a different relic weapon, you must either complete or abandon the current quest.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>クエスト「蘇る古の武器」を同時に複数、
受注することはできません。別の武器を入手したい場合は、
該当クエストをコンプリートするか、破棄する必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat the dhorme chimera!
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_QIB_TODO001<tab>ドルムキマイラを倒せ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_QIB_TODO002<tab>Defeat the hydra!
target: TEXT_JOBDRG001_01122_QIB_TODO002<tab>ハイドラを倒せ！
